info.author: Torsten Marek
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
libtagedit provides a C++ and python interface to music file tag editing which
should be as easy as possible. It has a plugin structure and is easily
extendable. Currently, it includes plugins for MP3 (ID3v2 r/w and ID3v1
reading), OGG and FLAC files.
info.keywords: mp3, ogg, id3v2, id3, flac, vorbis
info.name: libtagedit
info.summary: Simple C++ and Python interface for music tag editing
info.html_description: libtagedit provides a C++ and python interface to music file tag editing which should be as easy as possible. It has a plugin structure and is easily extendable. Currently, it includes plugins for MP3 (ID3v2 r/w and ID3v1 reading), OGG and FLAC files.
